name: DYSTOPIA © X-RAY Night Vision Edition
description:
🧱💀🎱🔥🚓😈💣 3500px x 1874px | By Your Neighbourhood Homie, Yung $lice.

100% of all proceeds are going to the non-governamental organization CUFA (Central Union of the Slums) /UNESCO for the “Mães da Favela”(Mothers of the Favelas) Project, which aims at providing support to Brazilian households led by women that have had their income affected by the COVID-19 outbreak.

-

In Brazil, there is a common expression “Cidadão de Bem” (The Good Citizen). Quite the contrary, these are not good people, it’s a denomination used to exclude and silence minorities, rebels and anyone they judge not worthy in society. The current leader of this mindset is the president, a psycho sociopath genocidal “Good Citizen” with authoritarian wishes and an eugenicist agenda. This artwork is a reflection of the dystopia Brazil currently resides in.
